quest.name: The Macabre Manor
journal:
The Adventurers' Guild investigator would present an ominous tale for your consideration.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The investigator relays to you the story of an adventurer who attempted to attend the Continental Circus's masquerade, only to have an altogether different and significantly more horrifying experience. Further investigation will be necessary to determine whether there is any truth to the tale.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

You speak to the enthralling illusionist, who is far too happy to confirm your suspicion of ill forces at work. She invites you to speak with either of the harlequin guides to enter the manor and learn its malign secrets for yourself.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: While you're in the area, I have one more tale that I'd like you to look into.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: Another adventurer reported to me that she entered the manor intending to attend the marvelous masquerade, only to find a gathering of another sort entirely.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: Where there should have been the chatter of conversation was deathly silence, and rather than revelers, voidsent stalked the halls. It sounds like the stuff of nightmares─and perhaps it was. But I don't feel right putting it down to an overactive imagination with the Continental Circus in town.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: If you believe this tale to have some merit, I suggest you inquire with the enthralling illusionist. She seems quite keen on getting people to enter the manor...

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: My, what a charming adventurer! I do hope you've been enjoying the masquerade.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: If you believe the tales of haunting experiences within the manor have merit, you should inquire with the enthralling illusionist. She seems suspiciously keen on her work.

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: You say our guests have witnessed the incomprehensible? Oh, my insuf─incomparable adventurer, but of course they have! During All Saints' Wake, light and shadow are hardly so different. Many have slipped beyond the veil, to see shattered the illusion of reality.

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: Our role is simply to prepare the venue for a broadening of perspective─to host a celebration like no other. I would be delighted to extend you an invitation to join us...if you dare.

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: Why the dour expression? If you're afraid, you need only speak to one of our harlequin guides before you go. Understand the rules, and you needn't risk losing more than most of your sanity.

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: Once you at last muster your courage, simply make your intentions known to them. They will be delighted to escort you.

dialogue.name: WITCH03172
dialogue.text: As for me, I must take my leave. The guiser keeps asking for help with some manner of “ghost problem,” whatever you take that to mean. Sweet waking dreams, adventurer...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Haunted Manor seasonal instance. To enter the manor, speak with the harlequin guide in either Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre or the Acorn Orchard.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Haunted Manor is a light party instance (four players). There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Parties that register for the instance with less than four members will be filled out automatically via the matching system.
